item.title: 三星跳涨，70 亿美元回购意外受到市场欢迎
item.description: 韩国最大的公司三星电子公司周五晚些时候宣布了一项令人吃惊的计划，将在未来一年内回购约 10 万亿韩元（72 亿美元）的自有股票。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. shares surged Monday after South Korea’s biggest company announced a surprise plan late Friday to buy back about 10 trillion won ($7.2 billion) of its own stock over the next year.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，高盛下调澳大利亚经济展望
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）下调了对澳大利亚2025年经济增长的预测，指出即将上任的特朗普政府预计对中国增加关税可能带来 "负面溢出效应"。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. lowered its forecast for Australia’s economic growth in 2025, pointing to likely “negative spillovers” from the incoming Trump administration’s expected increase in tariffs on China.】

item.title: 日元多头静待明年美日收益率差距缩小
item.description: 在连续两年看到日元反弹的赌注变成进一步下跌的冷酷现实后，一些策略师认为，第三次将是日本陷入困境的货币的魅力所在。【原文：After two straight years seeing bets on a yen rebound turn into the cold reality of further declines, some strategists reckon third time will be the charm for Japan’s beleaguered currency.】

item.title: 中国钢铁出口蓬勃发展，但这不会长久
item.description: 中国的钢铁出口大幅增长。历史表明，这种情况不会持久。【原文：China’s steel exports have exploded higher. History suggests it can’t last.】

item.title: 关税风险加剧紧张情绪，韩元可能面临更大压力
item.description: 韩元是今年亚洲表现第二差的货币，随着唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁给这个依赖出口的国家的经济前景蒙上阴影，韩元似乎有望进一步走软。【原文：The South Korean won, the second-worst performing currency in Asia this year, looks poised to weaken further as Donald Trump’s tariff threat clouds the export-reliant country’s economic outlook.】

item.title: 港股通开通 10 周年之际，投资者关注首次公开募股（IPO）渠道
item.description: 在中国通过与香港的贸易联系向广大国际投资者开放其交易所十年之后，投资者正渴望获得更深入的准入。【原文：A decade after China opened up its exchanges to a broad swath of international investors through a trading link with Hong Kong, investors are craving deeper access.】

item.title: 纽约市修订后的拥堵提案将在 2031 年前将收费提高至 15 美元
item.description: 纽约市交通官员将于周一就一项修订后的收费计划进行投票表决，该计划将从 1 月份开始向大多数驾车者收取 9 美元，到 2031 年将增至 15 美元。【原文：New York City transit officials are set to vote Monday on a revised toll program that would charge most motorists $9 to drive into large sections of Manhattan starting in January, with the fee set to increase to $15 by 2031.】

item.title: 美联储疑虑升温，亚洲股市开局疲软：市场综述
item.description: 周一早盘，大多数亚洲股市都将下跌，因为交易员们抑制了对美联储宽松政策的预期，并接受了当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的财政和贸易政策的代价。【原文：Most Asian stocks are set to fall early Monday as traders rein in expectations of Federal Reserve easing and come to terms with the cost of President-elect Donald Trump’s proposed fiscal and trade policies.】

item.title: Halozyme 首席执行官表示将为拟议的 Evotec 收购案提供现金资助
item.description: Halozyme Therapeutics Inc.首席执行官海伦-托利（Helen Torley）表示，该公司计划以现金出资20亿欧元（21亿美元）收购德国Evotec SE公司。【原文：Halozyme Therapeutics Inc. plans to finance its €2 billion ($2.1 billion) proposed takeover of Germany’s Evotec SE in cash, according to Chief Executive Officer Helen Torley.】

item.title: 华尔街银行家发现 1 万亿美元人工智能热潮中的丰厚酬劳
item.description:
金融界的大腕们已经准备好闯入人工智能派对。【原文：

Finance’s marquee names are ready to gatecrash the artificial-intelligence party. 

】

item.title: 斯塔尔默将会见习近平，用推动增长为英中解冻辩护
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，他将于周一会见中国国家主席习近平，这是旨在推动英国经济增长的解冻关系尝试的一部分，这使他与当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的鹰派立场相左。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer said he’ll meet China’s President Xi Jinping on Monday, part of an attempted thaw in relations aimed at driving economic growth in Britain that puts him at odds with the hawkish stance of President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 亚洲首富加入普及仿人机器人的竞赛
item.description: 一家由亚洲首富控制的印度初创公司正在进军类人机器人市场，与在这一新兴领域占得先机的美国和中国竞争对手一较高下。【原文：An Indian startup controlled by Asia’s richest man is entering the market for human-like robots, taking on US and Chinese rivals who have a head start in the burgeoning field.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选后，以黄金为支撑的交易所交易基金的持仓量受到打击。全球对更多鸡肉的需求提振了家禽生产商。随着联合国 COP29 气候峰会进入第二周，欧洲的数据显示我们正在失去限制全球变暖的斗争。【原文：Holdings in exchange-traded funds backed by gold are taking a beating following Donald Trump’s US election win. The global appetite for more chicken is giving poultry producers a lift. And as the United Nations’ COP29 climate summit enters its second week, European data shows we’re losing the fight to limit global warming.】

item.title: 米莱伊在卢拉的 20 国集团会议上愉快地扮演着搅局者的角色
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱在抵达里约热内卢参加巴西 20 国集团峰会之前，就已经开始为路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统的盛大聚会制造麻烦。【原文：Even before he landed in Rio de Janeiro for Brazil’s Group of 20 summit, Argentina’s Javier Milei had already started raining on President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s big party.】

item.title: 特朗普治下的真相社交、迟到电话占据了经济学家的生活
item.description: 罗布-苏巴拉曼（Rob Subbaraman）正在为他的第二个特朗普总统任期做准备，他的经济学家工具包里多了一个新配件：野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Rob Subbaraman is preparing for his second Trump presidency with a new accessory in his economist toolkit: the head of global markets research at Nomura Holdings Inc. has downloaded Truth Social, the President-elect’s conservative social media platform.】

item.title: 据说特朗普团队希望放宽美国对自动驾驶汽车的规定
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的过渡团队成员已经告诉顾问们，他们计划将建立完全自动驾驶汽车的联邦框架作为交通部的优先事项之一。【原文：Members of President-elect Donald Trump’s transition team have told advisers they plan to make a federal framework for fully self-driving vehicles one of the Transportation Department’s priorities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拉马斯瓦米认为承包商将在提高效率的过程中 "大幅削减 "成本
item.description: 企业家维韦克-拉马斯瓦米（Vivek Ramaswamy）表示，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将与亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）共同领导提高政府效率的行动，一旦这项行动开始实施，联邦承包商的收费将会 "大幅削减"。【原文：Federal contractors should expect “massive cuts” in what they can charge once President-elect Donald Trump’s government efficiency drive is underway, according to entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy, who will co-lead the initiative with billionaire Elon Musk.】

item.title: 2024 年国债收益缩水，美联储 12 月减息面临风险
item.description: 两个月来的暴跌几乎抹去了美国国债市场今年的涨幅，因为交易员们都在为唐纳德-特朗普的回归和美联储可能放缓降息做准备。【原文：A two-month slump has all but wiped out the US Treasury market’s gains for the year, as traders brace for Donald Trump’s return and also the chance of slower interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 习近平向特朗普伸出橄榄枝，同时就中国红线发出警告
item.description: 习近平利用与乔-拜登的最后一次会晤向唐纳德-特朗普发出了明确的信息：中国希望成为朋友，但也做好了在必要时开战的准备。【原文：Xi Jinping used his final meeting with Joe Biden to send a clear message to Donald Trump: China wants to be friends, but is ready for a fight if necessary.】

item.title: 贝森特与马斯克通话，财政部职位竞争仍在继续
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和 Key Square Group LP 创始人斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）正在考虑由当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）担任财政部长，据熟悉内情的人士称，马斯克公开支持霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）成为该职位的最佳人选。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk and Key Square Group LP founder Scott Bessent, whom President-elect Donald Trump is considering for Treasury secretary, spoke after Musk publicly endorsed Howard Lutnick as the best pick for the post, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国私人银行家 Friedrich von Metzler 逝世，享年 81 岁
item.description: 弗里德里希-冯-梅茨勒（Friedrich von Metzler）领导着拥有 350 年历史的德国私人银行 B. Metzler seel.Sohn & Co.Aktiengesellschaft 公司近 50 年的领导人，于周日去世，享年 81 岁。【原文：Friedrich von Metzler, who led 350-year-old German private bank B. Metzler seel. Sohn & Co. Aktiengesellschaft for almost 50 years, died on Sunday at age 81.】

item.title: 天空电视台称电影世界业主考虑让连锁影院在美国上市
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）周日报道，电影世界的所有者正在考虑让这家 2023 年退出伦敦证券交易所的连锁影院于 2026 年在纽约上市。【原文：Cineworld’s owners are considering listing the movie theater chain — which left the London Stock Exchange in 2023 — in New York in 2026, Sky News reported Sunday.】

item.title: 法国资深银行家马里斯将加盟精品公司佩雷拉
item.description: 法国交易员埃里克-马里斯（Erik Maris）同意加入精品咨询公司佩雷拉-温伯格合伙公司（Perella Weinberg Partners LP），以加强其对法国和欧洲各行业客户的覆盖。【原文：French dealmaker Erik Maris has agreed to join boutique advisory firm Perella Weinberg Partners LP to strengthen its coverage of French and European clients across sectors.】

item.title: 特朗普取得决定性胜利后黄金失去光泽
item.description:
最终结果消除了世界最大经济体的巨大政治不确定性，削弱了对人人喜爱的避险投资的需求。【原文：

The definitive outcome removed a huge political uncertainty in the world’s largest economy, muting demand for everyone’s favorite safe-haven investment.

】

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普如何削弱民主党对年轻选民的影响力
item.description:
前总统通过另类媒体传播的信息引起了年轻人的共鸣，尤其是那些在高成本中挣扎的年轻人。【原文：

The former president’s messaging, disseminated through alternative media, resonated with young adults — especially those struggling with higher costs.

】

item.title: 信息称英伟达面临新芯片服务器设计障碍
item.description: 据《信息报》援引公司员工、客户和供应商（未透露身份）的话报道，由于过热问题，Nvidia 公司最近几个月要求供应商改变其新型 Blackwell 图形处理单元的服务器机架设计，从而引发了对延期的担忧。【原文：Nvidia Corp. has in recent months asked suppliers to change the design of the server racks for its new Blackwell graphics processing unit due to an overheating problem, leading to worries about delays, the Information reported, citing company employees, customers and suppliers who weren’t identified.】

item.title: 特朗普的记分牌是 S&P 500，它是华尔街的最大希望
item.description: 如果说华尔街在唐纳德-特朗普的第一个总统任期内学到了什么，那就是股市是他记账的一种方式。他曾多次将股市上涨归功于自己，敦促美国人买跌，甚至考虑解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），因为他将股市下跌归咎于鲍威尔。【原文：If Wall Street learned one thing during Donald Trump’s first term as president, it’s that the stock market is a way he keeps score. At various points he took credit for equities rallies, urged Americans to buy the dip, and even considered firing Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell, who he blamed for a selloff.】

item.title: 苹果公司蒂姆-库克有办法应对迫在眉睫的特朗普关税
item.description: 由于严重依赖中国，苹果公司仍然容易受到唐纳德-特朗普关税的影响。但蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）很可能有一个计划来减轻这一打击。另外：详细了解苹果公司即将推出的智能家居设备，以及该公司在 AirTags 硬件升级方面取得的进展。【原文：With its heavy reliance on China, Apple remains vulnerable to Donald Trump’s tariffs. But Tim Cook likely has a plan to soften the blow. Also: A detailed look at Apple’s upcoming smart home device, and the company makes headway on the first-ever hardware upgrade for AirTags.】

item.title: 特朗普关税担忧加剧，新兴债券看似将遭受损失
item.description: 随着投资者放弃对降息的押注、对关税贸易战的担忧加剧以及美元飙升，新兴市场本币债券的前景正在恶化。【原文：The outlook for emerging market local-currency bonds is souring as investors dump bets on interest-rate cuts, fears of a tariff trade war grow, and the dollar surges.】

item.title: 阿布扎比王室企业和首次公开募股推动阿联酋股市市值达到 1 万亿美元
item.description: 在阿拉伯联合酋长国上市的股票价值目前首次超过了 1 万亿美元，这主要得益于与阿布扎比王室有关联的公司的激增，这些公司的股票价值占总价值的三分之一以上，同时也得益于当地股票的大量上市。【原文：Stocks listed in the United Arab Emirates are now worth more than $1 trillion for the first time, helped by a surge in firms tied to an Abu Dhabi royal that account for more than a third of the total value, and a flurry of local listings.】
